## Framework.get property

Returns a [Framework instance](/api/bud-framework/framework) from the [Framework/children](//bud-framework/framework/children) container

Signature:

```typescript
get: methods.get;
```

## Remarks

An optional function can be provided to configure the [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) instance.

## Example

```js
const name = "plugin";
const tapFn = (plugin) => plugin.entry("main", "main.js");

bud.get(name, tapFn);
```
